question: Which of the following is true regarding route tables?

answers.A: Every VPC has an implicit router
answers.B: Every has a main route table that delete and replace by other custom route table
answers.C: The target of a route can be IGW, VGW, a NAT device, a peering connection, or a VPC endpoint
answers.D: AWS allows a hard limit of 200 route tables per VPC with 50 routes per table
